location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File No. G/3 V. O. Miscellaneous Correspondence with the Muharraq Notables.'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 8; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located at the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 4-6; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence regarding school enrolment and arrangements for a car to pick up the Political Agent upon his arrival from Basra.The correspondence is between the Political Agent in Bahrain (Charles Geoffrey Prior), Ahmed bin Yousuf Fakhroo and Khanbahadur Abdul Hay al-Hashimi. The file is entirely in Arabic.
